data.title: Novak Djokovic
data.meta_description: Bio, results, ranking and statistics of Novak Djokovic, a tennis player from Serbia competing on the ATP international tennis tour
data.text:
Novak Djokovic is the second player in history to have won all 4 Grand Slam titles in succession. His wins include: Australian Open (6): 2008, '11-'13, '15-'16 - Roland Garros (1): 2016 - Wimbledon (4): 2011, '14-'15 & '18 - US Open (3): 2011, '15 & '18, 1 Davis Cup (2000). He also has 5 Year-End Masters titles (2008, '12-'15) and a co-record of 33 Masters Shields to his name as well as finishing the year as ATP #1 in 2011-'12 & '14-'15.
